TestCase.TestCaseTitle: Object progressing through a bounding box.
TestCase.TestCaseObjective: The objective of this test is to assess the ability to process MIP4 BSOs progressing through the previous - current position bounding box, allowing the consumer to detect if they get outside the geographical filter they defined during subscription.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: A Consumer receives MIP4 BSOs progressing through a bounding box and processes them into their system.Out of MIP4.0 scope.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: Test group 3.6 'Initialisation'. The Consumer has defined a geographical filter during subscription.
TestCase.TestCaseInput: Validated means to acquire information from the Producer using a MIP4 exchange pattern.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: The consumer can process MIP4 BSOs progressing through a bounding box.
TestCase.TestCaseOutput: The Consumer successfully acquires content from the Producer and is able to apply it to their system without error.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Obtain a MIP4 BSO inside the consumer's geographical filter, from the producer.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Content will be received from the Producer.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Process the MIP4 content on the Consumer.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: The Consumer will successfully process the MIP4 content without error, checking that the current bounding box is matching its filter.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Obtain the same MIP4 BSO that now has fallen outside the consumer's geographical filter, from the producer.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Content will be received from the Producer.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Process the MIP4 content on the Consumer.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: The Consumer will successfully process the MIP4 content without error, checking that the current bounding box is not matching its filter anymore and behaving accordingly.
